com.vdisk.utils

类 DesEncrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdisk.utils.DesEncrypt

  • public class DesEncrypt
extends Object
    DES加密解密算法，此方法用于将微盘token加密后保存到SharedPreferences中. 使用时从SharedPreferences读取出来，通过此方法解密后使用. DES encryption and decryption algorithm. This method is used to encrypt VDisk token and save it in SharedPreferences. Read it from SharedPreferences and decrypt it to use.
    作者:
    sina
